thread.title_full: Ground News - Editorial | To safeguard Israeli democracy, the Supreme Court must strike down this Basic Law

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Editorial | To safeguard Israeli democracy, the Supreme Court must strike down this Basic Law
text:
Summary by Ground News The leak of the High Court of Justice's draft ruling on the Basic Law on the Judiciary is akin to a targeted killing of the court's ruling. Its aim is to divert attention from the legal reasoning behind it and to the identity of the justices involved, and intimidate them. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Haaretz Lean Left High Factuality Independent: Salman Schocken Media Conglomerate: M. DuMont Schauberg Editorial | To safeguard Israeli democracy, the Supreme Court must strike down this Basic Law The Leak of the High Court of Justice's Draft Ruling on the Basic Law on the Judiciary, Which Bars Courts From Using the Reasonableness Standard, Is Akin to a T
